mapper.select: /* post.getPostList */ SELECT POST.*, IMG.save_file_nm FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NO, P.USER_ID, U.USER_NM, P.POST_CONT, P.FST_REG_YMD, P.LST_MOD_YMD FROM POST AS P JOIN [USER] AS U ON P.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE P.USER_ID IN ( #{user_id}, ( SELECT FRND_ID FROM USER_FRND_MG WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND ACCP_YN = 'Y' ) ) ORDER BY P.LST_MOD_YMD DESC ) POST LEFT JOIN POST_ATCH_IMG AS IMG ON POST.POST_NO = IMG.POST_NO;
